title: Calories in a Rice Krispie Bar
meta_description: Discover calories in rice krispie bar, including carbs, sugars, fat, protein, and sodium breakdown per serving, plus tweaks and FAQs.
h1: Calories in a Rice Krispie Bar
assumptions: Standard 30 g bar made with Rice Krispies cereal, marshmallows, and butter; no added toppings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, recipe, size, and preparation method. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: A typical Rice Krispie bar provides ~130 kcal, mostly from carbs and sugars.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Add 1 tbsp chocolate drizzle per bar
Make with brown rice crisps for whole grains

faqs.q: How many calories in one rice krispie bar?
faqs.a: About 130 kcal for a standard 30 g bar.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in a rice krispie bar?
faqs.a: Roughly 24 g carbs, including 12 g sugars and 0 g fiber.

faqs.q: Is a rice krispie bar high in sugar?
faqs.a: Yes, with ~12 g sugars per bar from marshmallows.

faqs.q: How much fat is in a rice krispie bar?
faqs.a: About 3 g total fat, including 2 g saturated fat.

faqs.q: Can rice krispie bars be made lower calorie?
faqs.a: Yes, by using less butter or sugar-free marshmallows to reduce by 20-30 kcal per bar.
